sentences.sContent: She says Russians have a lot of experience with dairy cows in barns, but not with beef cattle on open rangeland.
sentences.sContent_eng: She says Russians have a lot of experience with dairy cows in barns, but not with beef cattle on open rangeland.
sentences.sCn: 她表示，俄罗斯人在圈养奶牛方面经验丰富，但没有在开放牧场养殖菜牛的经验。

sentences.sContent: She says Russians have a lot of experience with dairy cows in barns, but not with beef cattle on open rangeland.
sentences.sContent_eng: She says Russians have a lot of experience with dairy cows in barns, but not with beef cattle on open rangeland.
sentences.sCn: 她说俄罗斯对牲口棚中养殖奶牛很有经验，但对户外牧场养殖肉牛没有太多经验。

sentences.sContent: However, some of the positive trends represent woodland and bush encroachment into rangeland and farmland - which is not generally regarded as land improvement.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, some of the positive trends represent woodland and bush encroachment into rangeland and farmland - which is not generally regarded as land improvement.
sentences.sCn: 尽管如此，部分积极的发展趋势表现为林地和灌木丛对牧场和农田的侵占，这通常不被认为是土地改善。

remMethod.val: range(漫游) + land(土地) → 牛羊可以漫游的土地 → 牧场

trans.tranOther: land that naturally produces forage plants suitable for grazing but where rainfall is too low or erratic for growing crops
